Find Your Medicine and Use It

21 Sep 2011

One of my favourite Kathleen the crossing guard (who we recently blogged about) sent me an email with this music video in it. Like Kathleen, this song is about  authenticity, happiness and how to live a good life.

It made my day so I’m sharing Nahko and Medicine for the People with you. Who couldn’t love a song with the lyric “There is no medicine on the television. So turn it off and turn yourself around.” Or, “Don’t waste your hate. Rather gather and create.” Wise words indeed.

And, in case you haven’t seen it yet, the little video we made about Kathleen (over 8000 views on Youtube) is also embedded here. Kathleen recently got a call from The Ellen Show (which featured the video when we first shared it). We’ll keep you posted on whether Kathleen gets to meet Ellen. Hopefully she’ll take me along with her since I’m a pretty good dancer too.

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada, and if you don’t know what that is, it’s time you do. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
